channel.title: Disable scheduled executions for non-admin users
channel.description: We need to disable scheduled queries and scheduled alert feature for non-admin users. Please share the steps/documentation to do the same.

item.title: Disable scheduled executions for non-admin users

item.description:
This functionality doesn’t exist in Redash today. I’m moving your post into the feature-requests section for consideration by the community.
